summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding proposed new language for a protective order for discovery in the Jeffrey Epstein case. The email includes an attachment of the draft order and seeks approval before sending it out.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, is proposing new language for a protective order in the Jeffrey Epstein case and seeking approval.

events.title: Drafting of Protective Order for Discovery
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney circulates a draft protective order for discovery in the Jeffrey Epstein case, with new highlighted language, seeking approval before finalizing.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 24, 2019, concerning legal proceedings against Jeffrey Epstein.
An Assistant United States Attorney is preparing a protective order for discovery, indicating active case management and concerns over sensitive information.
The email includes an attachment titled '2019-07-24,_JE,_protective_order_for_discovery_(RMB).docx', which is the draft order.
The correspondence shows prosecutorial activity in the Southern District of New York related to the Epstein case shortly before his death in August 2019.
